DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : AUTOS
DOC.TEXT: GM Cuts 30 # 000 Vehicles From Production Forecast : Affecting fourth-quarter production in North_America , the reduction was larger than many Wall_Street observers expected and prompted analysts to trim their earnings estimates for the giant auto_maker and predict more difficult times ahead for General Motors Corp . GM stock lost 37.5 cents per share Friday , closing at $ 37 1 / 4 on the New York Stock_Exchange . Since September , GM ' s stock has fallen by more_than a quarter amid growing concern about the auto_maker ' s ability to cash_in_on the current auto sales boom .
